:::spawn = 520 3242 3431 0 0 0 0 0

i added in shops.cfg
:::shop = 30 Loozers_shop 1 1 385

i added in client.java
::: else if (NPCID == 520) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 30;
}
